member.name: M:MassTransit.QuartzRegistrationExtensions.AddQuartzConsumers(MassTransit.IBusRegistrationConfigurator,System.Action{MassTransit.QuartzEndpointOptions})
member.summary: Add the Quartz consumers to the bus, using for configuration. Also registers the Quartz Bus Observer, so that Quartz is started/stopped with the bus.

member.name: M:MassTransit.QuartzRegistrationExtensions.ConfigureQuartzConsumers(MassTransit.IReceiveEndpointConfigurator,MassTransit.IBusRegistrationContext)
member.summary: When manually configuring a receive endpoint, configure the Quartz consumers for this endpoint

member.name: T:MassTransit.QuartzIntegration.QuartzBusObserver
member.summary: Used by container-based Quartz configurations, to start/stop Quartz along with the bus.

member.name: T:MassTransit.QuartzIntegration.SchedulerBusObserver
member.summary: Used to start and stop an in-memory scheduler using Quartz

member.name: M:MassTransit.QuartzIntegration.SchedulerBusObserver.#ctor(MassTransit.QuartzSchedulerOptions)
member.summary: Creates the bus observer to initialize the Quartz scheduler.

member.name: P:MassTransit.QuartzSchedulerOptions.SchedulerFactory
member.summary: Used to create the scheduler at bus start, defaults to .

member.name: P:MassTransit.QuartzSchedulerOptions.QueueName
member.summary: The queue name for the quartz service, defaults to "quartz".

member.name: P:MassTransit.QuartzSchedulerOptions.JobFactoryFactory
member.summary: Only supported when configuring the in-memory scheduler to inject the MassTransitJobFactory when not using a container.

member.name: P:MassTransit.QuartzSchedulerOptions.StartScheduler
member.summary: Whether to start the scheduler when bus starts, defaults to true.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
